message: I'm feeling generous, but let's make it a bit more even this time.
Come on, meet me in the middle!
Time is running out - let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
You're losing value, I'm being generous
This is getting ridiculous.  I'm willing to take a slight hit to end this, but I need you to meet me closer to the middle.
Your loss is my gain, literally
Okay, last offer.  Take it or leave it - I'm done playing games.
You're running out of time, I'm running up the score
This is my absolute final offer. Take it, or we both lose everything.
